name: Light Knight (Ray Noodle, Negikun, LeRickyRaccoon)
description:
LIGHT KNIGHT

An Evil Threat stole all the colors in the Kingdom. You are chosen from the Gods to use the last color they saved, the original light. You must travel to get the colors back, as they will help you in your quest to eliminate the enemies and to save the world. The prototype is the 1st dungeon you reach, through it you will acquire Blue and Red colors. Those colors are applied to your sword and you have to alternate them in order to kill coloured enemies, turn on lights and interact with obstacles.

Context

Action Adventure Game prototype made for the IVGD program in College. We managed to create this game in about 3 days total time over the span of 3 weeks.

Light Knight team: 
  • Maxime Lenglet: Game design, Level design, Level artist
  • Ricardo Lorenzo Garcia 
  • Charles Sterlin
  • Ray Nadeau 
CONTROLS

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Q to Attack

Once You get Blue Power, E to Activate & Deactivate

Once You get Red Power, R to Activate & Deactivate
